business_insights: Customer engagement (activity + hitrate + interactions) is the strongest driver of wins.
High competitor presence and diversity significantly reduces win probability.
Opportunities with balanced age (not too new, not too old) show better conversion.
Historical success with Product A is a strong predictor of future wins.
Iberia customers behave differently and deserve a tailored strategy.
recommendations: Prioritize opportunities with high customer_activity and customer_engagement.
Act early on deals with multiple competitors to avoid losing momentum.
Leverage historical product_A_sold_in_the_past to design cross-sell strategies.
De-prioritize very old, low-engagement opportunities (low opp_quality_score).
Increase touchpoints for medium-probability deals to push them into high-probability segment.
